material: steel with chrome plating and rubber/foam grip
usage: Strength training for shoulders, back, core, biceps/triceps and other muscle groups
key_features: SOLID HIGH GRADE STEEL & INOVATIVE STRUTURE
Handles will not bend or break

ai_description: A set of two compact dumbbells featuring shiny chrome-plated steel ends with the KAKSS brand and weight (2kg or 2.5kg) clearly marked. The dumbbells have black textured rubber or foam handles for secure grip. The product is shown in both studio shots against white backgrounds and lifestyle settings demonstrating various exercises like arm workouts, sidebends, and planks. The ultra-compact design appears suitable for versatile training in different environments.
target_audience: Beginners and professionals for home or gym use
